content.question: Which of the following works includes themes like shared cultural traditions, such as those found in Bearden’s work?

choices.label: A Red Record by Ida B. Wells-Barnett
Twelve Years a Slave by Solomon Northup

topic.text: 3.13: Envisioning Africa in Harlem Renaissance Poetry
